title: Beauty and the Beast
description: Here we meet Martin Payne, a cocky radio personality who always says what's on his mind. His loving and forgiving girlfriend Gina with her loud-mouth co-worker Pam. His buddies Tommy and Cole. And WZUP boss Stan and co-worker Shawn.

title: The Gift Rapper
description: It's Martin and Gina's anniversary. And Martin listens to his boss Stan and doesn't get a gift for Gina. She has all kinds of gifts for him. Making Martin feel bad and improvising big-time to get a gift.

title: Things I Do for Love
description: Martin takes Gina to a club to prove to her he is still romantic. But 1st have dinner with a smitten Tommy and his latest conquest,a girl named Danice. And "Jerome" the overbearing player makes a grand 1st appearance showing up at the club.

title: Boyz 'R Us
description: When the gang play a game called "The Book of Questions", Martin cannot handle it well when he finds out that Gina makes more money than he does. Cole tells his mom and it spreads like wildfire even reaching Martin's radio callers.

title: Dead Men Don't Flush
description: Martin calls a plumber to fix his broken toilet, but the workman dies in his bathroom.

title: Forever Sheneneh
description: Sheneneh wins a date with Christopher "Kid" Reid, and goes overboard in her eagerness to seduce him.

title: The Parents Are Coming, the Parents Are Coming
description: Martin makes a fool of himself in front of Gina's conservative parents.

title: A Woman with a Past
description: Martin's jealous when he learns his talk show guest once dated Gina.

title: Baby It's Cole'd in Here
description: Cole takes Martin's advice to stand up to his mother, then comes to Martin for help when she kicks him out.

title: The Night He Came Home
description: On Halloween, Martin and his friends gather at his apartment to share scary ghost stories.

title: The Great Payne Robbery
description: Martin's apartment is burglarized and he plots to catch the thief.

title: Three Men and a Mouse
description: Martin's desperate to rid his house of a mouse so Gina will return, but his eccentric exterminator fails to do the job.

title: Radio Days
description: A talk-radio starlet catches Martin's eye.

title: I've Got a Secret
description: Martin loses his friends when he lets out a secret on the air.

title: I Saw Gina Kissing Santa Claus
description: Martin dresses up as Santa for Tommy's Big Brother program.

title: Do the Fight Thing
description: Martin and Gina's on-air fight is such a hit, Stan wants to make her a regular but Martin's unenthusiastic.

title: Blackboard Jungle Fever
description: Martin hosts Career Day at his old elementary school and is hit on by his former third-grade teacher. When Gina walks in, she misunderstands the scene and dumps him.

title: The Break Up: Part 2
description: A fight over a Valentine's Day gift splits Martin and Gina. First of a three-part episode.

title: The Break Up: Part 3
description: Radio guest Billy Dee Williams convinces Martin to win Gina back, so he bursts in on her date with another man. Third of a three-part episode.

title: I'm Not Your Superwoman
description: Gina loses patience when a flu-stricken Martin expects constant attention and mothering.

title: Credit Card Blues
description: Martin's friends try to prove he's innocent when he's arrested for credit card fraud.

title: Jerome's in the House
description: Pam accepts a date with Jerome.

title: Your Arms Are Too Short to Box with Martin
description: Martin is faced with an angry gang of midgets, and learns a new lesson in bigotry.

title: Variety Show
description: Martin gets to produce the station's charity variety show, but the authority goes to his head.

title: Baby You Can Drive My Car
description: When the gang wins a new car, attempts to share it equally lead to chaos.

title: Checks, Lie, and Videotape
description: Martin and Gina expose the con artist preacher who bilked Martin's mother out of thousands of dollars.

title: Do You Remember the Time?
description: Martin tries to come up with a new topic for his radio talk show. Desperate, he gets some ideas from the crew. Gina's idea is that he tell the story of how they met and fell in love. During the discussion, Gina, Martin, Pam and Tommy each have different versions of what happened the night Martin and Gina met.

title: Really, Gina Is Not My Lover
description: Martin tries to impress his old schoolmates at his high school reunion, but things go wrong when Gina arrives looking terrible after a day at the dentist.

title: Got to Be There
description: When Martin's girlfriend, Gina , goes on a business trip, Martin suspects she is being unfaithful and drives 500 miles to stop her.

title: Beat It
description: When Martin invites his friends over to watch a championship boxing match, a fight starts between Cole and Tommy over a woman.

title: Baby, It's You
description: Martin's girlfriend, Gina, invites her friends over for a baby shower for a pregnant friend. However, Gina is late for the party, and the pregnant woman goes into labor after the other guests depart, leaving Martin to deliver the baby.

title: Workin' Day & Night
description: When Gina objects to Martin working day and night with little sleep, Martin's boss convinces him that Gina is dominating Martin.

title: Control
description: When Gina accidentally throws Martin's basketball tickets in the garbage, she agrees to work for Sheneneh in exchange for Sheneneh's good tickets.

title: You've Got a Friend
description: Martin is jealous when Gina (TISHA CAMPBELL) goes shopping with a male friend.

title: To Kill a Talking Bird
description: When Martin's Momma leaves Martin her pet bird to care for, Gina accidentally kills it.

title: Fat Like That
description: After Gina makes fun of Martin's weight, he attends her exercise classes and becomes obsessed with a healthy lifestyle.

title: Hollywood Swinging: Part 1
description: Martin quits his job to go to Hollywood to make his television debut on a popular talk show.

title: Hollywood Swinging: Part 2
description: Martin goes to Hollywood to appear on a TV talk show. Madonna, Michael Jackson, Burt Reynolds, Mel Gibson look-alikes are featured. R&B music group JODECI special guest stars.

title: Thanks for Nothing
description: When Martin's unruly relatives unexpectedly come to Thanksgiving dinner, they get into a fight with Gina's refined parents.

title: Whoomp! There It Ain't
description: Martin and Gina (TISHA CAMPBELL) bet that they can live without sex for two weeks to prove that their relationship is based on love.

title: Holiday Blues
description: Martin gets bus tickets to Philadelphia so Gina and he can be with her parents for Christmas, but a blizzard leaves them stranded in a bus terminal.

title: No Justice, No Peace
description: When Martin gets a traffic ticket, he goes to court to plead his case even though he knows he is wrong.

title: Suspicious Minds
description: When Martin's expensive new CD player is missing, he suspects that one of his friends stole it.

title: Love is in Your Face: Part 1
description: Martin thinks Gina is trying to trick him into marriage when she tells him she is moving to New York City due to a job promotion. First of a two-part episode.

title: Love Is in Your Face: Part 2
description: When a lonely Martin learns that Gina will be in Detroit for the weekend, he plans a romantic evening with her. Second of a two-part episode.

title: Arms Are for Hugging
description: Martin and Gina go on a mountain retreat for troubled couples. Richard Gant and Michael Jai White guest star.

title: Guard Your Grill
description: Martin challenges to a boxing match after Thomas flirts with Gina. This episode is written by series star.

title: Your, Mine and Ours
description: When Martin and Gina decide to share their money and open a joint checking account, they disagree on how the money should be spent.

title: I Don't Have the Heart
description: Martin and Pam become friends when Pam gets engaged to a very wealthy man who buys expensive gifts for Martin.

title: Crunchy Drawers
description: Martin has a nightmare that he is sexually attracted to Pam.

title: No Love Lost
description: Martin and Gina are so busy arguing that they miss Pam's engagement party for them.

title: The Hoedown in Motown
description: When Stan sells the radio station, the new owner changes the format. Martin must play country western music to keep his job.

title: Martin's on the Move
description: After Martin is unable to pay his rent because he is unemployed, he is evicted from his apartment and leaves Detroit to find a new career.

title: In Search of... Martin
description: Gina and her friends find Martin in a religious cult--and he refuses to leave.

title: Martin Returns
description: Martin returns home to find that Gina has redecorated his apartment and intends to move in with him. Tommy and Pam are becoming interested in each other.

title: I've Got Work to Do
description: Gina and Pam live together and hate it. With Gina's encouragement, Martin searches and finds several jobs but quits all of them.

title: Martin Gets Paid
description: A TV station manager calls Martin for a job interview, which Gina surreptitiously set up for him.

title: Break Up to Make Up
description: Martin tries to get Gina to be his girlfriend again while Tommy and Cole encourage Martin to date other women.

title: The Closer I Get to You
description: Martin becomes the "Love Doctor" when he is asked to substitute on a TV talk show. But his advice creates some unexpected consequences for Tommy and Pam.

title: Movin' on In
description: Martin and Gina move back in together, but there are too many belongings to fit.

title: Momma's Baby, Maybe Martin
description: Martin's efforts to impress his future mother-in-law collapse when a child shows up claiming to be his long-lost son. Marcus T. Paulk guest stars.

title: Whole Lotto Trouble
description: Martin wins the lottery and goes on a spending spree.

title: Get a Job
description: Martin and Gina attempt to discover information about Tommy's mysterious job. Nobody knows what Tommy does for a living, and when asked direct questions about his occupation, Tommy gives evasive answers, and questionable body-language. So they decide to go undercover and stake him out, only to discover him on the runway at an uptown strip club! Could this be what Tommy does for a living? Tracy Morgan guest stars.

title: Feast or Famine
description: On Thanksgiving, the women challenge the men to a cooking competition, with disastrous results. Singer MILLIE JACKSON guest stars.

title: Lockin' Boots
description: Gina is afraid to tell Martin that she can't drive her car because she has a lot of unpaid traffic tickets. But he exacts his own brand of punishment, anyway.

title: Go Tell It on the Martin
description: Martin's big Christmas TV show is almost ruined by a suicidal madman. BEBE and CECE WINANS sing Christmas carols.

title: Express Yourself
description: Gina is hired as a consultant on Martin's show--and major changes ensue.

title: Sophisticated Ladies
description: Gina and Pam struggle to transform themselves so they'll be accepted into an elite women's organization, but it's not what they think it is.

title: Ain't Nuttin' Goin' on But the Rent
description: Martin refuses to pay his rent in protest for bad service. Soon, he and Gina must live without heat and electricity.

title: The Ex-files
description: Martin and Gina each go out to dinner with former flames in order to prove the past is past. Vivica A. Fox guest stars.

title: All the Players Came
description: Martin hosts a '70s contest. ANTONIO FARGAS, ISAAC HAYES, RUDY RAY MOORE, OUTKAST, COOLIO, PAM GRIER and others guests star as themselves.

title: Best and Bester
description: Cole and Tommy compete to determine who will be Martin's best man at his wedding.

title: High Noon
description: Martin is pursued by an ex-convict (GARY COLEMAN) he helped imprison.

title: Mother of the Bride
description: Martin hires a cut-rate wedding planner to compete with his mother-in-law's lavish choice. Tracy Morgan and Kellita Smith guest star.

title: C.R.E.A.M.
description: Martin and Gina open a restaurant and business is great--until some unexpected disasters occur. GARRETT MORRIS and HAMMER guest star.

title: Girfriend
description: Gina's old friend, Monique, annoys everybody until Martin finds a way to expose Monique's insincerity.

title: The Romantic Weekend
description: Gina and Martin end up in the same island resort as Tommy and Pam. Each couple competes to have more fun.

title: Bachelor Party
description: Martin and Gina worry at their bachelor parties, and imagine what life will be like in five years. Yo-Yo guest stars.

title: Wedding Bell Blues
description: Exasperated with their bickering friends and feuding relatives, Martin and Gina sneak away on the night before their wedding. First part of a two-part episode that concludes with "Love is a Beach."

title: Love Is a Beach
description: Martin and Gina escape the pandemonium at home and finally have the perfect wedding ceremony. Music sensation BABYFACE (himself) performs. Second of a two-part episode that begins with "Wedding Bell Blues."

title: Martin in the Corner Pocket
description: The honeymoon is over for Gina when Martin stays out one night, playing pool and getting hustled until he loses even the clothes off his back.

title: Killing Him with Kindness
description: Martin thinks Gina wants to kill him for life insurance money.

title: Blow, Baby, Blow
description: When music producer BIGGIE SMALLS, aka THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G. (himself), comes to town, everybody wants to be a star.

title: Ring a Ding, Ding, Ding Gone
description: Martin takes off his wedding ring when his pals complain it scares off women, but he's the frightened one when he has to explain its loss to Gina.

title: Love T.K.O.
description: Martin and Gina's romantic weekend gets interrupted by everyone else's love woes. Tommy and Pam try living together.

title: He Say, She Say
description: Cole meets a special woman with a big secret.

title: Uptown Fright Night
description: After picking up Gina's prized earrings from the jeweler, Tommy, Cole and Jerome get robbed. Rappers SALT-N-PEPA guest star.

title: Old School Loving
description: When Gina gets too busy to take care of Martin, he makes a mess of her business life.

title: Cole on Ice
description: Cole gets terminated from his job, and Martin hires him, causing havoc when CHARLES BARKLEY (himself) appears on Martin's talk show

title: Housekeeper from Hell
description: Martin and Gina are afraid to terminate their tough new housekeeper (MARLA GIBBS).

title: Three Homies and a Baby
description: Martin, Bro'man and Sheneneh baby-sit Martin's infant nephew Cameron -- which Martin quickly regrets agreeing to do.

title: Head in' for Trouble
description: Gina's head gets stuck in their new brass headboard, forcing her to attend a vital meeting with the remnants of the headboard hidden beneath a wig and a shawl.

title: Swing Thing
description: Martin goes to a Christmas party where the guests are swapping more than gifts.

title: The Bodyguard
description: Gina and Pam witness a bank robbery and go into hiding.

title: Green Card
description: Pam owes $5000 in taxes, desperate to acquire the money to pay for her debts, she accepts an offer from Louis "the maintenance guy" to marry him so he can avoid being deported in exchange for the money the money that Pam needs. they arraigned a service at martin's house with a few of Maurice's family members, Tommy was the minister for the ceremony and he showed a lot of of hostility because he still has feelings for Pam from their previous relationship. After the marriage a immigration officer comes to validate the marriage, they almost past the test but they failed because Pam did not know Louis's last name. So Louis is going to be deported. while packing to leave, he found a picture that shows that he was born in a hospital in the U.S. based on the date on the picture which was a day after he was born.

title: You're All I Need
description: When Martin flirts with a producer's wife, Gina becomes jealous and fights back.

title: Kicked to the Curb
description: Martin and Gina end up homeless when their old apartment is sublet and the deal on the new one falls through. Desperate to recover their old place, they try to scare away the new tenants.

title: The Best of Martin
description: Whazzup! Whether you're a true blue fan of the hilarious hit comedy series Martin -- starring comedy star Martin Lawrence (Bad Boys films, Big Momma's House films, Wild Hogs) -- or discovering the series for the first time, you'll laugh out loud with this special retrospective leading up to the landmark 100th episode. Hosted by series star Tisha Campbell, who plays Martin's feisty and forgiving girl, Pam, take a look back at some of Martin's funniest -- and finest -- moments in The Best of Martin. Featuring episodes from the start of the series and some of the craziest characters played by Lawrence himself -- like favorites Jerome or Sheneneh -- you'll be screaming for more ... Mar-tin!

title: The Love Jones Connection
description: Sheneneh appears as a contestant on a dating game show and gets a lot more than a date. Chris Rock guest stars.

title: Where the Party At
description: Martin gets a big surprise on his birthday: No one wants to come to his party. Special Appearances by Halle Berry, Johnnie L. Cochran, Jr., Brian McKnight, Shaquille O'Neal, Chris Rock, Salt-n-Pepa, Donnie Simpson, Will Smith and Robert Townsend.

title: Homeo & Juliet
description: Martin's worried when Gina's role in a play requires that she kiss another man, but when the actor is injured, Martin stands in -- creating an outrageous version of "Romeo and Juliet" for a benefit performance.

title: The Cabin Show
description: Gina's got her heart set on a romantic weekend, but Martin is determined to watch his ball game. Then Martin and Pam get lost in the woods together and discover that their relationship is not what it seems.

title: The Tooth Will Set You Free
description: Pam is hypnotized for a painful dental procedure, but Martin's interference results in Pam's behaving like Martin on her date that night.

title: Martin, I Want to Sing
description: Martin tries to manage the fledgling music career of Pam's talented cousin.

title: D.M.V. Blues
description: Martin gets into trouble at the Department of Motor Vehicles.

title: Why Can't We Be Friends: Part 1
Why Can't We Be Friends: Part 2
Is You Is or Is You Ain't
description: Martin can't resist telling everyone when Gina says she might be pregnant. When Martin messes up the pregnancy test, he must go on a midnight hunt for another one.

title: Back in Trouble Again
description: Martin throws out his back but is determined that Gina won't find out, since she'd asked him not to play basketball right before her awards dinner.

title: Sophomore Jinx
description: Martin thinks that Gina wants a divorce.

title: Working Girls
description: Gina and Pam clash while trying to get a hip underwear designer to hire their marketing firm.

title: Boo's in the House
description: On Halloween, Martin and the gang visit his prospective new house--and get a real scare.

title: Banging Hard in the School Yard
description: Martin thinks he and the guys can beat Gina's women's basketball team--until he finds out that her players are members of the U.S.A. WOMEN'S BASKETBALL TEAM (themselves).

title: The Life You Save... Might Make You Rich
description: After saving a Nigerian prince's life, Martin finds out that the ruler wants Gina for his concubine.

title: Snow White
description: Tensions rise in the gang's ski trip when Pam brings an Afro-centric extremist along and Tommy seems to be moving toward marriage with his white girlfriend.

title: Come on over to My Place
description: When his mom interupts his date, Cole finally gets his own apartment--but no one else wants to be in it.

title: Scrooge
description: Miserly Martin is visited by three spirits on Christmas Eve. JACKIE CHAN makes a special appearance as himself.

title: Waiting, Debating & Ovulating
description: Martin and Gina try to conceive, but when he's called for jury duty he ends up being sequestered.

title: You Play Too Much
description: Martin and the gang trade practical jokes until one prank gets out of control. Method Man guest stars as himself. Erik Estrada also guest stars.

title: Ain't That About a Ditch
description: With Gina out of town, Martin tries to have a little fun with the guys--until Gina's mother visits unexpectedly. TONE LOC guest stars as himself.

title: Goin' Overboard: Part 1
description: When Gina misses the departure of a Valentine's Day cruise, Martin is left alone with Pam, Tommy and Cole until a sexy woman becomes interested in Martin. Pam and Tommy also find romance on the high seas--but not with each other. TED LANGE and LAUREN TEWES guest star. First part of a two-part episode.

title: Goin' Overboard: Part 2
description: On a cruise, Martin must evade an aggressive woman. Pam wakes up in bed with Cole. BERNIE KOPELL, TED LANGE and JILL WHELAN guest star. Second part of a two-part episode.

title: Power to the People's Court
description: Tommy represents himself when Sheneneh sues him, unaware she's hired legal superstar Ronnie Cochran.

title: I, Martin, Take Thee, Pam?
description: On a return trip to the Bahamas, Martin realizes that his marriage certificate lists Pam as his wife. David Alan Grier gueststars.

title: Auction
description: After giving Pam an annoying cuckoo clock, Martin finds out that it's a valuable antique.

title: Daddy Dearest
description: Tommy's ex-Marine dad visits, and Martin makes a bad business decision when he invests in Nipsey's as a silent partner.

title: Stake-Out
description: Martin uses surveillance equipment to track a criminal for a huge reward. KEITH SWEAT guest stars

title: Goin' for Mine
description: After being laid off, Pam gets an opportunity to work at a record company.

title: One Flew over the Hoochie's Nest
description: Pam's identical-looking cousin escapes from an insane asylum and takes over Pam's life.
